official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to authorize the provision of intermediate care services under medicare, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to authorize the provision of intermediate care services to persons requiring institutional care, but not the degree of care provided by a hospital or skilled nursing facility.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to authorize the provision of intermediate care services under medicare, and for other purposes.
